seed_pair.target: Salí el sábado por la noche.
seed_pair.known: I went out on Saturday night.

S0205: He olvidado la palabra que estaba intentando decir
I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.
S0206: Disfruto la oportunidad de practicar hablar contigo
I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.
S0207: Has hecho lo que necesitabas hacer
You've done what you needed to do.
S0208: I didn't want to ask you how to say it.
S0209: Quieren pasar más tiempo reuniéndose como grupo
They want to spend more time meeting as a group.
S0210: Piensan que necesitamos discutir el problema
They think that we need to discuss the problem.
S0211: Nos dijeron que no querían explicar.
They told us that they didn't want to explain.
S0212: They wanted to ask for help.
S0213: No sabemos qué están intentando lograr.
We don't know what they're trying to achieve.
S0214: ¿Pasaste un buen tiempo el fin de semana?
Did you have a good time at the weekend?

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
